text: Sarutahiko Shrine is a shinto shrine in Ise, Mie.https://www.sarutahikojinja.or.jp/english/ It is a beppyo shrine and a Hokora in the modern system of ranked shinto shrines. == Images == Image:猿田彦神社 - 大鳥居.jpg|Torii Image:猿田彦神社 - 手水舎.jpg|Chozuya Sarume Shrine.jpg|Sarume Shrine Image:猿田彦神社 - たから石.jpg|Iwakura Image:猿田彦神社 - 子宝池.jpg|Pond File:Hakutaka Barrels at Sarutahiko Shrine, Ise.jpg|Sake barrels ==References== Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Unranked shrines Category:Mie Prefecture
title: Sarutahiko Shrine
